title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 81.2 - Application of section 480 of the Tax Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 81.2 - Application of section 480 of the Tax Law

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 489

The provisions of section
480
of the Tax

Law and the provisions of Part 72 of this Title relating to licensing of
wholesale dealers shall be applicable to the registration of chain stores, to
the extent that such provisions can be made applicable to such registrations, as if such provisions expressly referred to registration of chain
stores. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
81.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
